channel.description: Recent content on Tech Blog - Acesyde

item.title: How to Automate Your Swimming Pool with Home Assistant
item.description: A swimming pool is an excellent addition to any home, especially during hot summer months. Not only does it provide a perfect way to relax after work, but with proper automation, you can also optimize energy consumption by controlling the pool pump motor efficiently.

item.title: How to Automate Your Gate with Home Assistant and ESPHome
item.description: Since building my house, I’ve been passionate about automating everything. Today, I’m excited to share my latest project: automating my gate.
